import React from "react"; import docIcon from "../assets/icons/documents-dash.png"; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import { useState } from "react"; function Documents() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
